title: A yw’r holl ysgutorion dal yn fyw
oneOtherQuestion: Has {executorName} died since the will was signed?
multipleExecutorQuestion: Have any of the executors died since the will was signed?

allalive.required: Atebwch ‘ydyn’ os yw’r holl ysgutorion dal yn fyw
allalive.required1: Select ‘yes’ if any of the executors have died since the will was signed
